snippet: The chief executive of Dallas’s M.L.S. team is facing charges that he beat and choked his wife at a Manhattan hotel.
abstract: FC Dallas chief executive Doug Quinn is facing charges that he beat and choked his wife after argument in their Manhattan hotel room; Quinn has taken indefinite leave from his job; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Dallas’s M.L.S. team is facing charges that he beat and choked his wife at a Manhattan hotel.
